data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mbo, Zingisile, Haddad, Charles R. (2019): A revision of the endemic South African long-jawed ground spider genus Drassodella Hewitt, 1916 (Araneae: Gallieniellidae). Zootaxa 4582 (1): 1-62, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4582.1.1|126 occurrences
